str2: Thus, so, in this manner. Or (referring to what precedes or follows).

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Nominative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
Of time: when, after; of cause: since, because; otherwise: else. From epi and ei; thereupon, i.e. Since.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
One who is eagerly devoted to a person or a thing, a zealot. From zeloo; a 'zealot'.

parse: Verb - Present Imperative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To seek, search for, desire, require, demand. Of uncertain affinity; to seek; specially, to worship, or to plot.
In order that, so that. Probably from the same as the former part of heautou; in order that.

parse: Verb - Present Subjunctive Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: From perissos; to superabound, be in excess, be superfluous; also to cause to superabound or excel.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Feminine of a compound of oikos and the base of doma; architecture, i.e. a structure; figuratively, confirmation.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
From a compound of ek and a derivative of kaleo; a calling out, i.e. a popular meeting, especially a religious congregation.
